Articles.Content:
Hello,

I cannot find an answer, to this. How may I configure the tickrates of DMP...5Hz seems pretty low.

Thanks for the help.

Try LMP instead for better sync (and some more bugs).

The DMP dev himself is also supporting LMP.

 

Actual answer to your question: download the DMP source code and recompile it with the tickrate changed.

Edited February 12, 2018 by SupperRobin6394
